html:
Walmart’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday events are here, and they’re bringing all the joy with jaw-dropping savings. You know I love finding pieces that feel like home and fit seamlessly into our cozy cottage life, and this year’s Walmart lineup is full of goodies that make my heart skip a beat. Let’s dive in!

Mark Your Calendars: Key Dates for Walmart’s Black Friday & Cyber Monday

Here’s the scoop so you don’t miss out:

  • Black Friday & Cyber Monday Leaks: Happening 11/21—start your planning early!
  • Deals Go Live:
    • 11/25: Early access for Walmart+ members and full access online.
    • 11/29: In-store Black Friday deals kick off at 6 a.m. local time.
    • 12/2: Cyber Monday brings a fresh batch of online-only deals for one day only!

I’ll definitely be grabbing my coffee early and making the most of these sales, especially since some of my favorite cozy finds are included.

Liz’s Top Picks from Walmart’s Black Friday Deals

Here are some items I’ve got my eye on—perfect for gifting, home upgrades, or just treating yourself to something cozy this season.

1. Cozy Loungewear Sets

  • Hard Tail French Terry Sweatshirt and Pant Set
    This set screams comfy and stylish—perfect for curling up with a book or decorating for the holidays.
  • Aleumdr Women’s Lounge Set
    Another cozy must-have, with a relaxed fit and soft material you’ll never want to take off.
  • Fantaslook Pajama Set
    The perfect mix of comfort and chic for those family movie nights!

2. Family Favorites

  • Matching Reindeer Christmas Pajamas
    You know I’m a sucker for matching holiday PJs—these are a must for creating those picture-perfect moments.

3. Home & Tech Upgrades

  • Dyson V15 Detect Vacuum
    Keeping the floors clean in a house full of coziness? Yes, please! Dyson’s power and precision make this a dream purchase.
  • RENPHO HEPA Air Purifier
    Clean, fresh air is such a gift—especially when you’re cozying up indoors this winter.
  • Udreamer Vinyl Record Player
    Add a little vintage charm to your home with this record player. It’s a stylish way to bring music into your space!

4. Gifts for the Practical Shopper

  • AVAPOW Car Jump Starter
    A must-have for road trips and emergencies. It’s peace of mind in a little package.
  • edx Dog Grooming Kit
    Perfect for pet parents—this grooming kit makes it easy to keep your furry friends looking their best.

5. Everyday Favorites

  • Reebok Women’s Logo Hoodie
    For quick errands or lounging at home, this hoodie is a great blend of function and style.

How I Shop Black Friday

I always recommend making a wishlist beforehand so you don’t get overwhelmed with all the deals. Walmart’s online early access makes it easy to snag your must-haves before they’re gone. And if you’re a Walmart+ member, you’re already winning with that early access on 11/25!

Don’t forget to set your alarms for 12/2 for Cyber Monday’s online-only deals. It’s the perfect time to grab those last-minute gifts or even treat yourself—you deserve it!

I hope you’re as excited as I am to dive into these amazing deals. Let’s make this holiday season one to remember with cozy finds, practical gifts, and all the good vibes.
